exampleSentences: An altar is a special table.
People put flowers and candles on the altar.
Families pray or show respect at the altar.
I put my toys in the box.
The cat likes to play with a cardboard box.
This is a big red box.
Mom uses the air fryer to make crispy fries.
The air fryer helps us cook food without much oil.
I like chicken nuggets cooked in the air fryer.
I sleep in my bed every night.
The bed is soft and comfortable.
My teddy bear sits on my bed.
An air purifier cleans the air in my room.
It helps me breathe fresh air every day.
My mom turns on the air purifier when we sleep.
I put my toys in the basket.
The picnic basket has yummy food.
She carries a big basket for laundry.
I eat cake at a birthday party.
This chocolate cake is very yummy.
My mom bakes a fresh cake every Sunday.
I sit on the chair.
The chair is red.
My cat sleeps on the soft chair.
My sister sleeps on the top bunk.
A bunk bed has two beds, one above the other.
Children often share a room with a bunk bed.
I like to eat candy.
The candy is very sweet.
My friend shares a candy with me.
The chicken has feathers.
A chicken lays eggs.
We see the chicken on the farm.
I use a blender to make a yummy smoothie.
The blender helps mix fruits and milk together.
My mom puts ice in the blender to crush it.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Tủ (có ngăn, thường dùng để đựng đồ)
exampleSentences: Mom puts the dishes in the kitchen cabinet.
My books are neatly in the living room cabinet.
The small cabinet holds all my art supplies.
A crab walks sideways on the sand.
It has two big claws to catch food.
Many crabs live in the ocean.
My mom uses the coffee maker every morning.
The coffee maker makes hot coffee for grown-ups.
It sits on the kitchen counter next to the toaster.
A coffee bean is very small.
People grind coffee beans to make a drink.
Some coffee beans are brown, and some are green.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Bàn làm việc hoặc bàn học.
exampleSentences: I do my homework at my desk.
My desk has a lamp and some books.
The teacher sits at a big desk in front of the class.
The cooktop is flat and smooth.
Mom places a pot on the cooktop to cook soup.
We clean the cooktop after dinner every day.
I drink water from a cup.
This cup is for milk.
The red cup is on the table.
The clock shows us what time it is.
I have a small clock next to my bed.
Look! The big clock on the wall is ticking.
I drink juice from a small can.
Mom opens a can of beans for lunch.
We put the empty can in the recycling bin.
We often eat dessert after dinner.
My favorite dessert is a big slice of cake.
Ice cream is a popular dessert for kids.
There is a long bench in the park.
Children often sit on the bench to rest.
My dog likes to lie under the bench.
I push the cart at the supermarket.
The baby sits in the shopping cart.
We put all the toys in the red cart.
This cooler keeps our drinks cold.
We take the cooler to the beach.
Dad puts ice and juice in the cooler.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Tủ trưng bày hoặc hộp trưng bày
exampleSentences: The museum has a big display case with old coins.
I see the beautiful cakes in the bakery's display case.
My grandmother keeps her special tea cups in a display case.
Mom puts the dirty plates in the dishwasher.
The dishwasher cleans our dishes very well.
We open the dishwasher to take out the clean cups.
The door is open.
Please close the door.
I knock on the door to enter.
The door is green.
Please close the door quietly.
I open the door to go outside.
I eat an egg for breakfast.
A chicken lays an egg.
The egg has a yellow yolk inside.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Một loại trái cây nhiệt đới lớn, có vỏ gai nhọn và mùi rất đặc trưng, được nhiều người yêu thích.
exampleSentences: Durian is a big, tropical fruit.
It has a very spiky skin and a strong smell.
Many people love to eat durian.
A fish swims in the water.
Many fish live in the ocean.
I like to watch the colorful fish.
The faucet is in the kitchen.
Turn on the faucet to wash your hands.
Water comes out of the faucet.
The air conditioner makes the room cool.
We turn on the air conditioner when it is hot.
It helps us feel comfortable in summer.
This flower is red and pretty.
A bee flies to the big yellow flower.
I like to smell the sweet flower.
The fan blows cool air.
I turn on the fan when it is hot.
The fan helps me stay cool.
We keep our food fresh in the fridge.
The fridge is very cold inside.
Mom puts milk and juice in the fridge.
The coffee filter stops the grounds from going into my cup.
This water filter makes the drinking water clean and fresh.
We change the air filter in our house to keep the air good.
I use a hair dryer to dry my wet hair.
The hair dryer blows warm air.
Mom keeps her hair dryer in the bathroom.
A durian is a large, spiky fruit.
It has a very strong smell.
Some people think durian tastes delicious.
I eat a piece of fruit every morning.
An apple is a healthy fruit.
Many fruits are sweet and delicious.
I keep my cookies in a big jar.
The jar is made of glass.
Mom puts flowers in a pretty jar.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Bàn là (dụng cụ ủi quần áo)
exampleSentences: Mom uses the iron to make her shirt smooth.
The iron gets very hot to take out wrinkles.
We use an iron to make clothes look neat and tidy.
This jar is empty.
Mom puts cookies in a big jar.
I see a jar of honey on the shelf.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Máy làm mát không khí (hoạt động bằng cách bốc hơi nước)
exampleSentences: An air cooler makes the room feel cool.
My family uses an air cooler on hot days.
It blows a cool breeze around the room.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Máy tạo độ ẩm / Máy phun sương
exampleSentences: A humidifier adds moisture to the air.
My dad puts the humidifier in my bedroom at night.
It helps me breathe better when the air is dry.
The cookie jar is full of yummy treats.
Mom keeps jam in a glass jar.
We use a small jar to hold pens.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Máy sưởi (thiết bị làm ấm phòng)
exampleSentences: The heater makes our room warm and cozy.
We turn on the heater when it is cold outside.
This small heater helps us stay comfortable in winter.
A juicer helps us make fresh juice.
My mom uses the juicer to make orange juice.
You put fruits like apples into the juicer.
The lamp is on the table.
It helps us see in the dark.
I turn on the lamp to read my book.
This is a shiny kettle.
My mom boils water in the kettle for tea.
The kettle whistles when the water is hot.
I use my laptop for school work.
My dad types emails on his laptop.
The laptop helps me watch videos.
I look in the mirror every morning.
The mirror shows my reflection.
There is a big mirror in the bathroom.
A bird builds a nest.
Little birds live in the nest.
The nest is high up in a tree.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Nệm hoặc đệm, dùng để ngủ trên giường.
exampleSentences: A mattress is very soft.
We sleep on a comfortable mattress every night.
The mattress fits perfectly on the bed frame.
I eat cereal from a bowl.
The cat drinks water from its bowl.
Mom puts fruit in a big bowl.
We eat meat for dinner.
This chicken meat is yummy.
My dog loves meat very much.
Mom bakes yummy cookies in the oven.
The oven gets very hot when it is cooking food.
We can make a delicious pizza in the oven.
I talk to my friend on the phone.
My dad uses his phone to check the weather.
This small phone fits in my pocket.
This plant has green leaves.
We water the plant every morning.
A tiny plant grows in the garden.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Gạo, một loại ngũ cốc dùng làm thức ăn chính.
exampleSentences: We eat rice for dinner.
Rice is a small white grain.
Many people around the world eat rice every day.
This is a clean plate.
I put my food on the plate.
The plate is on the table.
A robot vacuum cleans the floor by itself.
It moves around the room and picks up dirt.
My family uses a robot vacuum every day.
The sun gives us light every day.
We turn on the light when it gets dark outside.
A bright light helps me see my book clearly.
We use a rice cooker to make yummy rice.
The rice cooker sits on the kitchen counter.
My mom puts water and rice in the rice cooker.
A pallet is a flat wooden or plastic structure.
Workers use a pallet to move many boxes at once.
The forklift lifts the heavy pallet off the ground.
Mom uses the blender to make a yummy smoothie.
The blender spins very fast to mix fruits.
We put milk and bananas in the blender.
This is a very strong safe.
My mom keeps important papers in the safe.
The safe helps to keep things secure.
I like to eat a sausage with my eggs.
The hot dog has a tasty sausage inside.
My mom cooks sausages for our picnic.
Look, there is a book on the shelf.
I put my toys on the top shelf.
This shelf holds many pictures.
Mom cooks soup in a big pot.
The little plant is growing in a small pot.
I see a pot on the kitchen stove.
I use the scale to weigh my toy car.
The doctor uses a scale to check my weight.
My mom puts fruit on the kitchen scale.
We sit on the sofa to watch TV.
The big, comfy sofa is in the living room.
My cat loves to sleep on the sofa.
The shelving unit holds many books.
I put my toys on the top shelf of the shelving unit.
Mom organizes our craft supplies on the tall shelving unit.
A shrimp is a small animal that lives in the sea.
Many people like to eat shrimp because it is delicious.
Shrimp can be pink when it is cooked.
A speaker makes music loud so we can hear it.
I connect my phone to the speaker to play songs.
We use this speaker to listen to stories and sounds.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Thiết bị điện tử phát ra âm thanh, loa.
exampleSentences: This speaker plays my favorite songs.
I can hear loud music from the speaker.
The speaker is small and easy to carry.
I carry my lunch in my bag.
The shopping bag is full of food.
She has a small bag for her toys.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Nồi hoặc dụng cụ dùng để hấp thức ăn bằng hơi nước.
exampleSentences: Mom uses the steamer to cook vegetables.
The steamer makes food soft and hot with steam.
You can make healthy meals with a steamer.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Ghế đẩu (ghế không có lưng tựa)
exampleSentences: This is a small stool.
I can sit on the stool to reach the book.
The stool is made of wood.

base.vietnameseMeaning: Bếp (dùng để nấu ăn, sưởi ấm)
exampleSentences: A stove helps us cook yummy food.
My mom uses the stove to make dinner.
Be careful, the stove can get hot.
A squid lives in the ocean.
It has many arms to swim and catch food.
Some squids can change their color very fast.
A tree is very tall.
Birds make their nests in a tree.
We can sit under a big tree for shade.
We eat dinner at the table.
The book is on the table.
This table has four legs.
We watch cartoons on the TV.
The TV is in the living room.
My mom turns on the TV to watch the news.
The big truck carries many boxes.
My toy truck is red.
A fire truck has a loud siren.
The toilet is in the bathroom.
Please flush the toilet after you use it.
We use the toilet to go to the bathroom.
My mom uses the vacuum cleaner to clean the floor.
The vacuum cleaner helps to make the house tidy.
It makes a loud noise when it works.
I drink water from a bottle.
The baby has a milk bottle.
Mom fills the bottle with juice.
Mom uses the vacuum to clean the rug.
The vacuum makes a loud noise.
We keep the vacuum in the closet.
Mom carries snacks on a big tray.
The tray holds many colorful cups.
We use a tray to bring food to the table.
I keep all my clothes in the wardrobe.
The wardrobe has two big doors.
My mom helps me organize my shirts in the wardrobe.
This vase holds beautiful flowers.
Mom puts the vase on the table.
The vase is made of clear glass.
I wear a watch on my wrist.
My watch tells me the time.
This watch has a big, round face.
A car has four wheels.
The bicycle wheel spins very fast.
The toy truck has small wheels.
This water filter makes our drinking water clean.
We have a water filter in our kitchen.
The water from the filter tastes fresh and good.
We drink fresh water from the water dispenser.
The water dispenser can give us hot or cold water.
Mom fills her cup at the water dispenser every morning.
A car has four wheels.
The bike has two big wheels.
We can spin the wheel.
The water heater makes hot water for us.
It helps us take a warm shower.
My mom turns on the water heater in the morning.
